channel.title: No package qubes-template-whonix-gw-experimental available
channel.description:
I'm trying to run the command to install the whonix template VMs as stated in the wiki but it just gives me a "no package available"
Is it just not in the repository right now? Please help?????
Edit by Patrick: changed title

item.title: No package qubes-template-whonix-gw-experimental available
item.dc:creator: selim37
item.description:
On Mon, Aug 03, 2015 at 03:44:16PM +0000, tibi234 wrote:

Hello, Compañeros!
Does anybody know, what wrong is done with Whonix templates?
They are not available from 31 of July (cca when Qubes R3 rc2 was relesed).
Similar question independently appeared on Whonix forum - without competent
ansver, therefore I try to get answer here on the right place - in Qubes
community.
(... qubes-template-whonix-gw-experimental and qubes-template-whonix-ws)

Repository metadata got messed up during adding kernel.org mirror. Fixed
now

Best Regards,
Marek

Read full topic

item.title: No package qubes-template-whonix-gw-experimental available
item.dc:creator: Patrick
item.description:
I don’t know that. Please ask on the qubes-users mailing list. Provide the information you already shared here. That’s rather a Qubes than a Whonix problem. (No worries, difficult to know.) Because downloading templates is up to Qubes. What’s inside the templates is mostly up to Whonix.

Read full topic

item.title: No package qubes-template-whonix-gw-experimental available
item.dc:creator: XII
item.description:
Patrick:

Maybe general network issues? Are you able to update and/or install other packages? Try that first please.

edit: figured it out, qubes-templates-community in qubes-templates.repo was set to enable=0

EDIT 2: now I get this;

Repository qubes-templates-itl is listed more than once in the configuration Repository qubes-templates-community is listed more than once in the configuration No package qubes-template-whonix-gw-experimental available Error: Nothing to do

Read full topic

item.title: No package qubes-template-whonix-gw-experimental available
item.dc:creator: Patrick
item.description:
Maybe general network issues? Are you able to update and/or install other packages? Try that first please.
